_header: Hail Queen of heaven and stern of bliss
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 515.
Subjects: Virgin Mary, prayers to; prayers, to Virgin Mary
_description: A prayer to the Virgin Mary — two quatrains (aabb)

BLAru285.First Lines: HAIll quene of hevin & sterent of blissSen þat þi sone þi fader Is…
BLAru285.Last Lines: …Thou polist gem without offenceThou bair þe lambe of Innocence
